nodes.text: Target blasters were small but powerful stun blasters carried for unprofessional, minimal usage, and were popular among city dwellers such as politicians. It was common among captains of freighters or diplomatic vessels. Those who lived in the deeps of Coruscant usually carried a target blaster or something more powerful. Target blasters only emitted heavy stun bolts, and were incapable of killing.
Senator Bail Organa used a Kueget LN-21 blaster pistol, modified to fire only stun blasts, as his target blaster of choice during the Clone Wars.
